General.Name: Companhia Tecidos Santanense Ltda
General.Description: Companhia Tecidos Santanense Ltda. engages in the textile business in Brazil and internationally. The company is involved in the manufacture and sale of clothing products, including professional uniforms, accessories, personal protective equipment, and sportwear and workwear products. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1891 and is headquartered in Montes Claros, Brazil. Companhia Tecidos Santanense Ltda. operates as a subsidiary of Oxford Comércio e Participações S.A.
General.Address: Avenida Osmane Barbosa, No 1235, Montes Claros, MG, Brazil, 39404-006
